solution_line_template: So far Alex and Max are running the race for {even_distance} + {alex_ahead_1} + {max_ahead} + {alex_ahead_2} = <<{even_distance}+{alex_ahead_1}+{max_ahead}+{alex_ahead_2}={distance_covered}>>{distance_covered} feet.

If the road they're racing each other on is {total_road_length} feet long, {total_road_length} - {distance_covered} feet = <<{total_road_length}-{distance_covered}={feet_left}>>{feet_left} feet left for Max to catch up to Alex.
